subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Matt Kuchar has gone from a 32-year-old pro with a couple of PGA Tour wins in 10 years to a front-runner for player of the year and a member of the U.S. Ryder Cup team.
snippet: Matt Kuchar has gone from a 32-year-old pro with a couple of PGA Tour wins in 10 years to a front-runner for player of the year and a member of the U.S. Ryder Cup team.
